scripts.up:d: npm run imgen-config && sudo docker-compose up --build --force-recreate -d
scripts.up: npm run imgen-config && sudo docker-compose up --build --force-recreate
scripts.up:dev: npm run imgen-config && sudo docker-compose up
scripts.up:dev:build: npm run imgen-config && sudo docker-compose up --build
scripts.dev: npm run down && npm run up:dev
scripts.dev:build: npm run down && npm run up:dev:build
scripts.update: npm run down && docker image rm websites && git pull && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && npm run up:d
